casebody.data:
State of Connecticut v. Robert J. Gray (11355)

Daly, O’Connell and Heiman, Js.

Argued June 11 decision released July 6, 1993 Joseph D. Courtney, for the appellant (defendant). Leah Hawley, assistant state’s attorney, with whom, on the brief, were Patricia Swords, state’s attorney, and Sandra Tullius, assistant state’s attorney, for the appellee (state). Per Curiam.

The judgment is affirmed.
